p: Further studies are needed to describe cockroach carriage of the several other food-borne pathogens that have not been reported previously. These include important food-borne pathogens such as C. perfringens, C. botulinum, Campylobacter spp., norovirus, and hepatitis A. In addition, there is the need for a better understanding regarding hostâ€“microbe relationships that occur between cockroaches and food-borne microbial pathogens. Microbiome studies could provide invaluable insights in this regard.
